Windlord:

"To hurt him..."replied windlord "When the Preds anounced that she 
was reprogramed, Rodimus was very very enraged... Almost killed a 
predacon femme and severy wounded Hydras... Took a lot effort to 
convince him to come back the base and heal his wounds... May I 
sugest, sir, that we should move toward our base... here're a 
perfect target."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, foxmanroar1@a... wrote:
> "Why do they target her?" Sabre grew up after the war of the 
sparks.. but he 
> had fought battles with renegades, it elluded him as to why a 
woman would be 
> a target.
> 
> Convoy thought about it. "To hurt primes ego... or to cause him 
distress that 
> would cause him to fail in combat."
